prompt: Review my Resume and Cover Letter in my Google Docs. Identify key achievements and strengths and suggest a revised LinkedIn profile summary and headline tailored to my target role. Recommend 3 YouTube tutorials on personal branding for LinkedIn.

prompt: Write pytest unit tests for the following Python function: [paste function]. Include edge cases, parameterized tests, and any necessary fixtures.
comment: Popular developer prompt from the Gemini cookbook for automating test coverage.

prompt: Convert this recipe text into JSON using this schema: {title,ingredients:[{name,quantity,unit}],steps:[{step_number,description}],servings,time_minutes}. Use the values from: [paste recipe].
comment: Recipe-to-JSON is a high-utility structured-output prompt from Google's Prompt Gallery.

prompt: Generate 10 blog post ideas and short outlines for [topic] aimed at [target audience]; include an SEO title, three subheadings, and a suggested 150-character meta description for each.
comment: Upwork and content teams widely share this format for fast content planning and SEO-friendly drafts.

prompt: Analyze my Gmail (label: B2B Prospects) for the last 3 months: summarize each thread, rank leads by engagement, and draft 5 prioritized follow-up message templates.
comment: Emerging workflow prompt leveraging Gemini's mailbox integrations — highlighted by godofprompt.ai for sales automation.

prompt: You are a marketing writer: create five ad-copy variations (short, medium, long) for [product], each targeted to a different customer persona and ending with a clear CTA.
comment: High-demand prompt for rapid A/B testing and creative briefs (featured in Gemini prompt lists).

prompt: Summarize this research paper [paste link or abstract]: list the research question, methodology summary, key results, limitations, and propose three follow-up experiments or study directions.
comment: Common research-assistant prompt recommended for literature reviews and grant/scoping work.

prompt: Rewrite the following email to be concise and professional for an executive audience; preserve facts, reduce length to ~100–150 words, and provide a one-line subject suggestion.
comment: Widely used productivity prompt to improve communication effectiveness (from ClickUp-style prompt guides).

prompt: Convert this natural-language pattern into a regular expression: [describe pattern]. Provide the regex, explain each component, and give three example strings that match and three that do not.
comment: 'Regexed' prompt from the Gemini gallery — trending among developers needing quick, explainable regex solutions.

prompt: Give me 10 blog post ideas related to [topic] that are engaging for [target audience]
comment: Popular ClickUp prompt for overcoming writer's block and widely shared in productivity guides

prompt: Write a 500-word article on [topic] with an introduction, three subheadings, and a concise conclusion
comment: Recommended by Upwork as a clear instruction to get structured long-form content

prompt: Create a LinkedIn job post template to hire a remote content writer for my SaaS company, include responsibilities, skills, and screening questions
comment: Common hiring prompt from Upwork guides used to speed recruiting copywriting

prompt: Summarize the key arguments and conclusions of the latest IPCC report on climate change and list three policy implications
comment: Research-style prompt trending for extracting concise insights from major reports

prompt: Analyze my Gmail for conversations labeled 'B2B Prospects' in the last 3 months, rank them by engagement, and recommend prioritized follow-ups
comment: Popular business-operational prompt for sales triage cited by GodOfPrompt

prompt: Convert this natural-language constraint into a regex: [describe constraint], and explain each part of the pattern
comment: From Google's Prompt Gallery (Regexed); trending for developer automation tasks

prompt: Given this article or PDF URL, summarize the key points and produce a five-item action checklist for a non-expert reader
comment: Frequent productivity prompt that helps turn long content into actionable steps

prompt: Draft a five-step email nurture sequence for [product], each email with a subject line, 2-sentence preview, and a single CTA
comment: Workflow prompt from Google Workspace marketing examples for lead nurturing

prompt: Conduct market research on [industry], list five emerging trends with one source each and recommended tactical next steps
comment: Trend-focused prompt; PromptWorld notes such prompts go viral when tied to actionable outputs

prompt: Create a 45-minute lesson plan to teach quadratic equations to 9th graders with learning objectives, three example problems, and answer key
comment: From Google API prompt gallery (Math Tutor/Worksheet Generator); trending among educators

prompt: Generate 10 blog post ideas related to [topic] that are interesting and engaging for [target audience].
comment: High-use content-ideation prompt cited in ClickUp; great for beating writer's block

prompt: Write a 500-word article on [topic] targeted to [audience] and include these SEO keywords: [keywords].
comment: Clear length + SEO instructions recommended by Upwork guides for consistent output

prompt: Summarize the key findings and policy recommendations from the latest IPCC report in 6 bullet points.
comment: Research/summarization prompt from Upwork's Gemini examples — trending for rapid briefing

prompt: Create a 5-email nurture sequence for [product], including subject lines, preview text, and CTAs for segments [segment A],[segment B].
comment: Marketing automation prompt highlighted in Google Workspace resources for campaign-ready copy

prompt: Convert this recipe text into JSON following this schema: {name, ingredients:[{item,quantity}], steps:[{step}], servings, cook_time} — [paste recipe]
comment: Developer-friendly 'Recipe to JSON' prompt from Google AI Gemini prompt gallery

prompt: You are a senior product manager. Draft a one-page PRD for [feature] including user problem, success metrics, user stories, and rollout plan.
comment: Business/product prompt format recommended across Upwork/Workspace for fast product docs

prompt: Given this meeting transcript: [paste], summarize action items, owners, and deadlines in a table.
comment: Popular for Gemini in Meet note-taking and post-meeting follow-ups in Google Workspace examples

prompt: Create five creative social media captions and three image concept prompts for a [product] launch aimed at Gen Z, with hashtags and suggested posting times.
comment: Combines ClickUp and Workspace marketing examples; trending for launch-ready social content

prompt: Explain quadratic equations and generate a worksheet of 10 problems with answers, ordered easy→hard.
comment: Education-focused prompt from Gemini API cookbook (Math Tutor/Worksheet Generator) — widely used by teachers

prompt: Turn this photo description [describe image] into a 6-panel comic storyboard outline with short scene captions and suggested camera angles (text only).
comment: Inspired by Nano Banana comic examples — trending among creators for storyboarding and image-edit planning

prompt: Generate 10 blog post ideas related to [topic] for a [target audience], each with a one-sentence angle and a suggested SEO keyword.
comment: From Upwork's Gemini prompt list — trending for content ideation and productivity.

prompt: Summarize this email thread and extract action items, owners, deadlines, and a suggested one-paragraph reply.
comment: Popular daily workflow prompt highlighted by Tom's Guide for faster inbox catch-up.

prompt: Look at this photo of my pantry [upload image] and create three balanced dinner recipes, plus a shopping list for missing ingredients and estimated costs.
comment: Real-world visual-to-text prompt Tom's Guide called a game changer for quick meal planning.

prompt: Act as a senior marketing consultant and draft a 6-week launch plan for a new mobile app targeting Gen Z, including KPIs, channel mix, sample ad copy, and a 3-email nurture sequence.
comment: Example workflow from Gemini in Workspace; trending for campaign planning and cross-product prompts.

prompt: Convert this recipe into a JSON object using schema {title,ingredients:[{name,quantity,unit}],steps:[{stepNumber,text}],servings,prepTime}. Normalize units and ingredient names.
comment: Directly from the Gemini API prompt gallery (Recipe to JSON) — trending for structured outputs.

prompt: Given this Python function, add unit tests covering edge cases, provide the test code and a brief explanation of each test and expected result.
comment: Gemini API 'Unit Testing' recipe — popular among devs for automating test generation.

prompt: Rewrite the following message in a more professional, concise tone suitable for an executive update (max 150 words): [paste message].
comment: ClickUp and other productivity guides highlight rewriting prompts for clearer workplace communication.

prompt: Create 5 A/B variations of ad headlines and descriptions for [product], optimized for paid search, and suggest 3 negative keywords and audience segments for each variation.
comment: Marketing prompt from Upwork's Gemini examples — trending for performance marketers and SEM.

prompt: Explain [complex topic] like I'm 10 years old, then provide a 3-step learning path and three beginner resources (book, article, video).
comment: Tom's Guide lists 'explain like I'm 10' as a high-value learning prompt for quick comprehension.

prompt: Analyze this image [upload image], list identifiable objects with counts and confidence scores, and output a structured inventory table plus three creative social-post use cases.
comment: From the Gemini prompt gallery ('List items from image' / 'Object identifier') — trending for image-to-text and content repurposing.

prompt: Generate 10 blog post ideas related to [topic] that are engaging for [target audience], include 5 SEO keywords and 5 suggested titles.
comment: High-usage content prompt from ClickUp-style lists — trending for overcoming writer's block and SEO planning.

prompt: Draft a LinkedIn job post for a remote content writer for a SaaS company: include role summary, responsibilities, required skills, salary band, and 3 screening questions.
comment: Derived from Upwork examples — popular for hiring and standardizing job descriptions.

prompt: Create a 5-step digital marketing strategy to increase sales for my Etsy shop selling customized gift cards; include channels, a 4-week sample campaign, sample ad copy, and KPIs.
comment: Mirrors Upwork/Workspace marketing prompts — trending among small ecommerce sellers and creators.

prompt: Summarize the key findings and actionable recommendations from the latest IPCC (or other major) climate report in 300 words, and list 3 policy or business actions.
comment: Research-focused prompt from Upwork/ClickUp — trending when major reports publish and for concise briefings.

prompt: Analyze my Gmail labeled 'B2B Prospects' from the past 3 months: summarize top 5 leads, rank by engagement, and recommend next-step outreach with suggested messages.
comment: From GodOfPrompt-style automation prompts — trending for sales enablement and email triage.

prompt: Review my resume (paste text) and suggest a revised LinkedIn headline, a 75-word profile summary, and 3 achievement bullets rewritten with metrics.
comment: Popular personal-branding prompt from GodOfPrompt resources — trending for jobseekers and recruiters.

prompt: Generate 5 A/B test ad copy variations and 5 email subject line options for a nurture campaign promoting [product]; include target segment and CTA per variant.
comment: Inspired by Google Workspace marketing flows — trending for fast campaign ideation and optimization.

prompt: Translate this text: [paste text] into [language], preserving tone and idioms for [audience], then provide a brief localization note and two alternative phrasings.
comment: Simple but high-demand prompt (ClickUp/Upwork) — trending for internationalization and localization tasks.

prompt: Act as a math tutor and teach quadratic equations: give a step-by-step lesson, 5 solved examples (varying difficulty), and a 5-question quiz with answers.
comment: From Google AI prompt gallery (Math Tutor) — trending in education and homework help use cases.

prompt: Summarize this meeting transcript (paste) into a 100-word executive summary and a 5-item action list with owners and deadlines.
comment: Based on Gemini in Meet examples (Workspace) — trending for teams wanting quick, actionable meeting outputs.

prompt: Look at this photo of my pantry [upload image] and create three balanced dinner recipes I can make with what's on these shelves. Include a shopping list for missing ingredients and estimated cook times.
comment: Image-to-recipe prompts are trending for convenience and meal-planning; popularized in Tom's Guide.

prompt: Here's a picture of my living room [upload image]. Suggest three design makeovers — one minimal, one cozy, and one modern — and create a shopping list with estimated costs for each style.
comment: Interior-design-from-photo prompts are viral as users test quick makeovers and cost estimates (Tom's Guide example).

prompt: Upload my portrait and transform it into a 3D collectible-style figurine or animated character, keeping facial features natural and providing three style variations and color palettes.
comment: Nano Banana / 3D figurine edits are widely shared on social platforms, driving a surge in character-transformation prompts (QuillBot, viral trend).

prompt: Edit this photo: remove distracting background elements, change ambient lighting to 'evening', replace the vehicle with a futuristic car, and generate a step-by-step change log and final image options.
comment: Advanced image-editing prompts (background replace, ambient light) are trending thanks to Gemini Nano Banana demos (YouTube NavEdits).

prompt: Summarize the key points from this email thread [paste thread], list action items, and prioritize them by urgency and business impact.
comment: Email triage and summarization save time for busy users—featured across guides and Workspace integrations.

prompt: Rewrite this message in a [tone/style] that's more [professional/casual/persuasive], keep it under 150 words, and provide two alternative subject lines.
comment: Tone-adjustment and copy-polish prompts are high-utility for workplace communication (Upwork/ClickUp examples).

prompt: Brainstorm 10 creative social media post ideas and five short captions with hashtags to promote [product/service] to Gen Z, include suggested posting times and one A/B test variation.
comment: Social-marketing prompts remain popular for creators and small businesses aiming for engagement (Upwork, Workspace marketing recipes).

prompt: Analyze this web page or document [paste link] and generate 10 SEO-friendly blog titles, meta descriptions, and a 500-word article outline tailored to [target audience].
comment: Content/SEO generation prompts are trending for rapid content production and optimization (ClickUp, Upwork resources).

prompt: Act as a career coach: given my role, current salary, achievements, and target increase, provide a negotiation script, rebuttals to common manager responses, and next-step follow-up emails.
comment: Roleplay/advice prompts (career coach, therapist, expert) are frequently used for personalized guidance (Tom's Guide noted roleplay utility).

prompt: Convert this recipe image or ingredient list into structured JSON using schema {name, ingredients[], steps[], servings, prep_time, nutrition}, and flag any missing info.
comment: 'Recipe to JSON' and schema-conversion prompts come from the Gemini API prompt gallery and are popular for developers and automation.
